domain.location

Class LocationPair

  • java.lang.Object
    • domain.location.LocationPair
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    DiagonalLocationPair

    public class LocationPair
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents an immutable pair of Locations: from and to.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      LocationPair(int fromIndex, int toIndex, IBoardSize size)
      Construct a new LocationPair based on two location indices and an IBoardSize.
      LocationPair(Location from, Location to)
      Construct a new LocationPair based on two Locations.
      LocationPair(LocationPair copy) 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean equals(java.lang.Object obj) 
      int getColumnDistance()
      Returns the distance in number of columns between this Pair.
      Location getFrom()
      Returns the from Location.
      int getRowDistance()
      Returns the distance in number of rows between this Pair.
      Location getTo()
      Returns the to Location.
      java.util.Collection<Direction> getUnitDirection()
      Returns one or two Directions corresponding to the direction of the vector pointing from from to to.
      int hashCode() 
      boolean isOnSameColumn()
      Returns true if from and to lie on the same column, false otherwise.
      boolean isOnSameDiagonal()
      Returns true if from and to lie on the same diagonal, false otherwise.
      boolean isOnSameRow()
      Returns true if from and to lie on the same row, false otherwise.
      java.lang.String toString()

    • Constructor Detail

      • LocationPair

        public LocationPair(Location from,
                    Location to)
        Construct a new LocationPair based on two Locations.
        Parameters:
        from - The from Location.
        to - The to Location.

      • LocationPair

        public LocationPair(int fromIndex,
                    int toIndex,
                    IBoardSize size)
             throws LocationOutOfRangeException
        Construct a new LocationPair based on two location indices and an IBoardSize.
        Parameters:
        fromIndex - The location index corresponding to the from Location.
        toIndex - The location index corresponding to the to Location.
        size - The IBoardSize to consider when converting location indices to Locations.
        Throws:
        LocationOutOfRangeException - If the indices are invalid for the given IBoardSize.

        public boolean isOnSameRow()
        Returns true if from and to lie on the same row, false otherwise.

      • isOnSameColumn

        public boolean isOnSameColumn()
        Returns true if from and to lie on the same column, false otherwise.

      • getUnitDirection

        public java.util.Collection<Direction> getUnitDirection()
        Returns one or two Directions corresponding to the direction of the vector pointing from from to to. For example, if to lies north-east of from, this method will return Direction.Above and Direction.Right.
